Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 856 Taxicabs

856.01Taxicab defined. 856.02Operator’s license required; expiration date; fee. 856.03License applications. 856.04License issuance; insurance; bond; display of licenses. 856.05Taxicab stands. 856.06Display of rates; excessive charges. 856.07Minimum age of drivers. 856.08Suspension or revocation of licenses. 856.09Renewal of licenses. 856.10Inspections; damaged vehicles. 856.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Operation and equipment - see TRAF. Ch. 438

Taxicab stands - see TRAF. 452.10

Licensing in general - see B.R. & T. Ch. 820
